attributes.action: To remove Cllr Holland from office as he is in breach of freedom of speech
attributes.additional_details: This petition is a clear example of disrespect of peoples' human rights and it is not suitable for a member of parliament to advocate the destruction of democratic principles. We the signatories' demand the petition to be ignored, Cllr Holland to step down from parliamentary duties and a public apology for the complete disregard of democratic principles.
attributes.background: To remove Cllr Holland from office as he is in breach of the fundamental right of freedom of speech through his petition: "Amend the Treason Felony Act to make supporting UK membership of the EU a crime."

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing local councillors from office.
